title: Workshop on Instructional Design Model Evaluation and Practical Task-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Instructional Design Concepts and Mathematics Education Experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on evaluating and applying instructional design models based on math teaching experience as a current practitioner. Collaboration and digital tool use in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Analyze and comparatively evaluate core principles of various instructional design models (e.g., authentic task provision, prior knowledge activation, feedback delivery)
Design and implement authentic task-based learning scenarios suitable for mathematics education contexts
Learners can evaluate instructional design models using assessment tools that measure learner satisfaction, learning outcomes, goal achievement, and other metrics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
